Class TaskRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.repository.TaskRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TaskRepository extends Object implements Serializable
Repository class for managing tasks.

    • teamAvailability

      public boolean teamAvailability(List<Task> teamTasks, Task task)
      Checks the availability of a team for a given task.
      Parameters:
      teamTasks - the list of tasks assigned to the team
      task - the task to check availability for
      Returns:
      true if the team is available for the task, false otherwise

      Returns:
      the list of tasks assigned to the team

      Parameters:
      taskSelecionada - The task for which vehicle availability is checked.
      vehicles - The list of vehicles to be considered for availability.
      Returns:
      A list of vehicles that are available for the given task.

      startDate - the date on which the task is to be scheduled
      startTime - the time at which the task is to start

    • getTasksAssignedToMeBetweenToDates

      public List<Task> getTasksAssignedToMeBetweenToDates(String userEmail, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves the tasks assigned to the specified user within a given date range.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - the email of the user whose tasks are to be retrieved
      startDate - the start date of the range
      endDate - the end date of the range
      Returns:
      a list of tasks assigned to the specified user within the given date range
